title: 3's ranked down?
body: Is 3's ranked down?  Not seeing the option to pick it, but can't find any info on it being down.

replies.body: Ranked teams for both 3s and 5s are on a schedule and change depending on weekday or weekend.  Our full schedule for each region can be found in our [Ranked Schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) guide.  Hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck in your games!

Just like ranked 5 teams, ranked for Twisted Treeline is only available at certain times of the day. On weekdays it's available from 4pm to midnight PDT, and on weekends it's available from 2pm to midnight PDT.

Wait, what?!?  Is that seriously the only times you can play ranked?  I mean, it kind of works for me personally as it is 7pm to 3am eastern time, but my brother and sister in law are in Germany, so for them it's 1am to 9am?!?

Would it be different times if we picked a different region or something?

Is there a list of the times for the different regions somewhere?


....ok, found the link for the schedules...https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule

Booo, combine some regions and open up the times.  I mean, a lot of them are 4 hours right now, that's weak.
